content: barbie day-to-night top by vicki johnson may 2015 this is a pattern for a top that can be lengthened to a nightgown for barbie or other similar size fashion dolls the upper section for the top is worked the same for each version with variations given for the bottom portion there are two variations for the bottom section plus an extra option given for each variation to give the same stitch a different look or effect materials  size 10 crochet thread the white top was made with red heart classic #10 the yellow top was made with aunt lydia s #10 the variegated top was made with nazli gelin garden space #10 the teal top was made with aunt lydia s #10 the pink nightgown was made with red heart bamboo #10  size 7 1 65 mm hook  one snap for neckline abbreviations  chain chain  single_crochet single_crochet  st s stitch  slp st slip_stitch used to join rounds  skp - skip  double_crochet double_crochet gauge approximately 9 row in rib stitch = 1 and 3/8 wide i say approximately because different threads can work up to a slightly different gauge directions for ribbed section all row worked through the back loop this section is worked for all variations  row 1 chain 4 single_crochet in the 2nd chain from hook and across remaining two sts 3 single_crochet  row 2 40 chain 1 single_crochet in each st across 3 single_crochet directions for remaining upper section all row worked through both loops this section is worked for all variations  row 1 chain 1 working in the end of each of the ribbed row single_crochet across 40 sts  row 2 chain 1 turn single_crochet in 8 sts chain 4 skp 6 sts single_crochet in 12 sts chain 4 skp 6 sts single_crochet in 8 sts 28 single_crochet 8 chain = 36 sts  row 3 chain 1 turn single_crochet in 8 sts single_crochet in 4 chain sts single_crochet in 3 sts 2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in 4 sts 2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in 3 sts single_crochet in 4 chain sts single_crochet in last 8 sts 38 sts  row 4 chain 1 turn single_crochet in 14 sts 2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in 8 sts 2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in 14 sts 40 sts  row 5 chain 1 turn single_crochet in 14 sts 2 single_crochet in each of the next 3 sts single_crochet in 6 sts 2 single_crochet in each of the next 3 sts single_crochet in 14 sts 46 sts  row 6 chain 1 turn single_crochet in 17 sts 2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in 10 sts 2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in 17 sts 48 sts  row 7 - 8 chain 1 turn single_crochet in each st across 48 sts  row 9 chain 1 turn single_crochet in 14 sts *single_crochet 2 sts together* 4 times single_crochet in next
